solution_line_template: Since Kyle can lift {more_pounds_this_year} more pounds and that is {times_as_much} times what he could do before, that means that last year Kyle could lift {more_pounds_this_year} pounds / {times_as_much} = <<{more_pounds_this_year}/{times_as_much}={pounds_last_year}>>{pounds_last_year} pounds.
Kyle can now lift {more_pounds_this_year} pounds + {pounds_last_year} pounds he could lift last year = <<{more_pounds_this_year}+{pounds_last_year}={total_pounds_now}>>{total_pounds_now} pounds.
